column4: Uncategorized;Two foreign men riding a motorbike had an accident ------at around 7:10 pm on October 28
column5: 2018 at 566 Corner Street and 313 Street in Boeung Kok II commune
column6: Toul Kork district.------According to the source
column7: the foreign men were hit by a car and taken to hospital
column8: and the car driver was detained after trying to flee the scene.------
